statements: DELETE FROM planting_schedule WHERE crop_name = 'Tomato' AND temperature_range = '20-30°C';
DELETE FROM planting_schedule WHERE rainfall_amount > 50 AND soil_ph <= 6.5;
DELETE FROM CropManagement WHERE crop_name = 'Tomato' AND management_practice = 'Fertilization';
DELETE FROM crop_yield WHERE crop_name = 'Tomato' AND yield_amount < 1000
DELETE FROM Weather_Data WHERE location = 'Farm A' AND observation_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM field_maintenance WHERE field_id = 'Field_A' AND pest_control = 'Organic';
DELETE FROM crop_details WHERE optimal_ph < 6.5 AND growth_period > 90;
DELETE FROM field_maintenance WHERE field_id = 'A001' AND pests_control = 'organic';
